Package owl.util

Class UncloseableWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • owl.util.UncloseableWriter

  • public final class UncloseableWriter
extends java.io.Writer
    A wrapper for writers which only forwards a Writer.flush() upon close(). This is useful in combination with, e.g., System.out, since upon calling close on that stream, nothing can be written to console anymore.

    Warning: Code using these writers should still use try-with-resource guards or similar, as otherwise the output may not get flushed.
